name: Livedress
tag_list: fashion, style, beauty, mobile, social-network, iphone
overview:
Livedress is a social/mobile network that enables fashion merchants to develop and deploy a Mobile Storefront for their business and for consumers to connect & share with fashion lovers locally, globally.

The Toronto-based company enables small businesses in the fashion industry, such as designers and boutiques to ‘go mobile’. The Livedress mobile platform - currently available on iOS, is a simple way for a business to promote merchandise, share news, and engage with consumers locally. Livedress consolidates the marketplace so shoppers don’t need to download 10 apps to connect with 10 stores. Shoppers download Livedress for iPhone (for free) and customize their experience by tapping “follow” on the Storefronts they care about.

In addition to following the designers/boutiques they care about, fashion consumers can follow one another. Individuals can follow friends, gurus, stylists, and celebrities to track their fashion inspirations.

Global brands harness the company’s consumer-influence engine, anchored by its proprietary technology, PushPoint™. Clients include Fortune 500 fashion labels, retailers, cosmetic brands and CPG firms.
